name: Dino Flippers
description:
"Those who dino vs Those who no."

A Card-Based Single Screen Strategy where you have to face the 'duality' of effects with the cards every other turn.

Instructions:

Click and drag the cards with your mouse. Make sure to drag the card on the placement grid in order to place the card or else, it would return back to the hand. Click on the Add/Plus button on the bottom left when a card is supposed to be added. Drag the card on the Cross button on the bottom right in order to remove/discard a card.

Developed by Mutee (https://itchforever.itch.io) and Bilal. Special thanks to Aamir for coming up with that quirky quote. :D
